long_description: hcc offers a variety of ways to connect with friends - like book club. hcc seeks to share the truth of the gospel with our community. hcc studies the bible and seeks to draw closer to god. please bring a side dish, salad, or dessert. if you are looking for a place to develop friendships and relationships with bible based messages addressing the issues relevant to today's concerns in your life and looking for a church that has ministries for everyone in your family, hadley community church can fulfill those needs. god sees and cares about our heart; it's not about the style of clothing we wear. come join hadley community church for vacation bible school!when: july 11th – 15th from 9am – 11:30amwhere: 3638 hadley rd., hadley, mi 48440ages: 3 years old through youth that finished 6th gradewe will be teaching lessons on the sanctity of life.if you need transportation to the church for vbs, please contact us at:(810) 797-4540(for more… continue reading.
